name: DontFollowMe
description:
Wellcome to my first ever finished game. 

It is about seeking silence and the need  to go outside and interact with the world.  Speaking of Interaktion: Use WASD to walk and collect apples to calm your hunger and stay in the garden to brighten your mood. 

BUT: Don't  get caught by overly friendly neighbors.  They will kill your mood! 


This is my first game in Godot and i have to declare 2 things: 
1. It took me about 30 minutes to have a working prototype and about 1h for the Arts. After that i startet failing my time management more and more ...
2.  It took me a sleepless night and two days to reach the point you see now. 

Have fun!!!
